scripts.benchmark:full-check: pnpm --filter @ndg/ndg-core build && pnpm --filter @ndg/ndg-ec3 build && node benchmarks/ec3/generate-full-check-report.mjs && pnpm --filter @ndg/ndg-ec3 benchmark:full-check:verify
